participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Playful and imaginative, with a love for candy and dreams of being a dog.
participant_1.background: i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i'm four years old.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, enjoys outdoor activities and has a playful side with gambling.
participant_2.background: i've been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i like to grill outdoors.
